name: HealthLiteracyAndCommunicationPanelPCAMAnswers
title: Health Literacy and Communication Panel [PCAM] Answers
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms that are answers to assess patient's disease knowledge),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to codify knowledge assessment answers),(Inclusion Criteria: The answer LOINC codes in the Health literacy and communication panel [PCAM]),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes that are not members of the Health literacy and communication panel [PCAM] Answers.)

contains.display: Reasonable to good understanding and already engages in managing health or is willing to undertake better management
Reasonable to good understanding but do not feel able to engage with advice at this time
Little understanding which impacts on their ability to undertake better management
Poor understanding with significant impact on ability to manage health
Clear and open communication, no identified barriers
Adequate communication, with or without minor barriers
Some difficulties in communication with or without moderate barriers
Serious difficulties in communication, with severe barriers
